content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1715418815988{background: #181923 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/about-bg.png?id=930) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”inner-spacer tophdr”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Empowering Growth Through Technology: Your Vision, Our Expertise

Don’t hesitate to reach out to our knowledgeable experts now.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1718274992227{background-image: url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/who-bg.png?id=941) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text el_class=”alth3″]

Who We Are

Looking for a Digital Transformation of your Business?

Experience Efficiency Redefined with Our Dynamic Technology Services. From software solutions to digital transformation strategies, we offer the tools you need to thrive in the modern landscape.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Company Profile” style=”custom” custom_background=”#01aae5″ custom_text=”#ffffff” i_icon_fontawesome=”far fa-file-pdf” add_icon=”true” el_class=”comp-profile”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”greybg”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Our Historical Journey

Your digital transformation partner, building software that adapts, evolves, and excels with your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Pioneering new directions in software development since 2013, we’ve become leaders in digital transformation. Dreams Technologies has grown from supporting small businesses to delivering enterprise-grade solutions. Trust us for seamless migration to modern architectures and customized software development.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_single_image image=”2521″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_row_inner gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2482″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Vision

Our vision is to drive change across industries through innovative software development, harnessing digital transformation as a gateway to unparalleled growth and efficiency.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2483″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Mission

We pioneer in software development and automation, empowering businesses to confidently navigate the evolving digital landscape. Through custom solutions and collaborative partnerships, we propel transformative success, fostering growth and excellence.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2484″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Our Principle

At Dreams Technologies, our principle is simple: innovate with purpose. We are committed to delivering exceptional software solutions that enhance the human experience and drive progress.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html el_class=”greytle”][/vc_raw_html][vc_row_inner gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2500″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Innovative Solutions

We thrive on pushing boundaries, exploring new ideas, and delivering advanced solutions that exceed expectations and drive success for our clients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2501″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Continuous Improvement

We believe in the power of evolution. Through ongoing learning and adaptation, we continually refine our processes, sharpen our skills, and stay ahead of the curve, ensuring we always deliver the best possible outcomes for our clients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2502″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Transparency and Trust

Transparency isn’t just a value; it’s the cornerstone of our relationships. We believe in open communication, honesty, and integrity in all our interactions, fostering trust and long-lasting partnerships with our clients and team members alike.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”greybg”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html el_class=”greytle”][/vc_raw_html][vc_masonry_media_grid element_width=”3″ gap=”10″ initial_loading_animation=”fadeIn” grid_id=”vc_gid:1739272067571-f68435d1-beec-2″ include=”2554,2564,2555,2544,2545,2546,2547,2548,2549,2553,2550,2556,2558″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”alth3″ width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2515″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”alth3″ width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Skill Up, Dream Big – With Dreams Technologies

Nurturing Talent for Tomorrow

We are dedicated to cultivating a culture of continuous learning and skill improvement in our employees to meet the evolving industry’s need for technical proficiency, adaptability, and innovation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2507″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Life Skills Workshops

We emphasize the importance of soft skills with workshops focusing on communication, teamwork, leadership, and problem-solving, enabling our employees to thrive professionally.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2508″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Continuous Training

We provide ongoing training in cutting-edge software tools and technologies to keep our team at the forefront of industry trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”30″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2509″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Practical Experience

Our employees learn through real-world projects, which reinforce their technical expertise and ready them for career challenges.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2510″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Certification & Recognition

We offer certifications for completed training and acknowledge exceptional achievements, fostering a culture of excellence and growth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1718275151496{background-color: #f5f7fa !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html el_class=”greytle”]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRU91ciUyME1hbmFnZW1lbnQlMjBUZWFtJTIwJTNDc3BhbiUzRU91ciUyMFRlYW0lM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNFJTNDJTJGaDIlM0UlMEElM0MlMkZkaXYlM0U=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”teambox colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Leo Chelliah

Co-Founder and MD

Leo Praveen Chelliah co-founded Dreams Technologies and serves as its Managing Director. He is also the Founder and CEO of Dreams Technologies Limited in the UK and Head of Product Delivery at Brickendon Consulting. He has 20+ years in software and a Master’s from BITS, Pilani.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Guru Chelliah

Co-Founder and CEO

Guru Prasad Chelliah is the Co-founder and CEO of Dreams Technologies, a company he launched alongside his brother in 2013. Over the past 11 years, he has led the organization with unwavering dedication. He holds a Master’s in Computer Science Engineering. With two decades of experience in the software field, he brings a wealth of expertise in technology strategy, business development, and leadership.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Anto Bino Santhosh

Director of Technology

Bino has been Dreams Technologies’ Director of Technology for six years. With a 15-year corporate career and a Master’s in Computer Science, he started as an Operations Manager and progressed through roles as Project Manager and Delivery Manager.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”teambox colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Vijay A

Technology Architect

Vijay, with 15 years of tech experience and an engineering degree, has been with Dreams Technologies for a decade. Starting as a PHP Developer, he advanced to Technology Architect, managing client projects and setting high standards for project teams.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Soosairaj C

Product Owner

Soosairaj oversees product metrics and launches at Dreams Technologies. With 20+ years in tech and a Computer Science degree, he began in UI/UX design and now excels as a Product Owner, ensuring successful product positioning and market expansion.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mrs. Alisha Jasmine

HR Head

Alishia has 15 years of HR experience and has been with Dreams Technologies for five years. With a Master’s in Business Administration specializing in HR, she is dedicated to enhancing employee well-being and driving HR improvements across the organization.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”teambox colbox justify-content-center”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Mr. Vasanthakumar Duraisamy

Business Development Manager

With 23 years of experience, Vasanthakumar Duraisamy excels in Operations, Sales, Business Development, and Customer Services. He drives revenue growth and ensures business continuity with expertise in operations management, digital marketing, property management, and international trade.

   

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
